Concentric (through Point)

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Draw - Arc - Concentric (through Point)
Shortcut: A, G
Commands: arcconcentricthrough | ag

Description:

With this tool you can create concentric arcs that go through a specified point.

Procedure:

  1. Enter the number of concentric arcs to create in the options tool bar.
  2. Click the base arc.
  3. Click the location through which the first concentric arc should go.
